mapper.select: select * from test1.commitevent where commitDate = #{pid} and commitDate=#{date}
mapper.update: update student inner join ( select commitevent.pid, sum(commitevent.totalAddLines) addLines, sum(commitevent.totalDeleteLines) deleteLines, sum(commitevent.totalChangeLines) changeLines, count(pid) times from commitevent group by commitevent.pid ) t on t.pid=student.id set totalAddLines=t.addLines,totalDeleteLines=t.deleteLines, totalChangeLines=t.changeLines,totalCommits=t.times where student.id=t.pid
